channel.title: Post your favorite games(Internet Website, Armor Games, etc)!
channel.description:
Well, this thread might create a discussion. A lot of people have favorite game sites, such as AddictingGames, Miniclip, Crazy Monkey Games, Armor Games, etc. This thread was created for you to post your favorite games on these sites. I will create a list so there are no double-posted games. Post the link to the game, feel free to comment on other games, etc.
Credits to oksuper_ for showing me this one: [url=http://armorgames.com/play/4309/this-is-the-only-level]This is the only level[/url]
This one is very confusing and quite challenging as well: [url=http://armorgames.com/play/4369/multitask]Multitask[/url]
and a fun one: [url=http://armorgames.com/play/3614/crush-the-castle]Crush the Castle[/url]
If you have more than one game, please post them all in a single post. Any spam will be cleaned out from this thread and punishments would obviously be given out normally.
List of already posted games:
[ul][li]This is the only level[/li] [li]Multitask[/li] [li]Crush the Castle[/li] [li][url=http://www.addictinggames.com/bloons.html]Bloons[/url][/li] [li][url=http://www.addictinggames.com/bloonstd3.html]Bloons Tower Defense 3[/url][/li] [li][url=http://www.addictinggames.com/cubefield.html]Cubefield[/url][/li][/ul]

item.title: Post your favorite games(Internet Website, Armor Games, etc)!
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

This Is The Only Level was fun to play. I tried Multitask a couple of minutes ago and got 125.
I got to the fourth box, and once you hit 120 points the difficulty of every box increases.

Read full topic
item.source: Post your favorite games(Internet Website, Armor Games, etc)!

item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

fuck it pisses me off i almost beat the 3rd box on multi task and my ball on the first screen falls off

@infamous actually play the game before you post.
